name: ea-utils

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
Command-line tools for processing biological sequencing data. Barcode
demultiplexing, adapter trimming, etc. Primarily written to support an
Illumina based pipeline - but should work with any FASTQs.

dependencies.name: bamtools
dependencies.description: C++ API & command-line toolkit for working with BAM data.

dependencies.name: gmake
dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.

dependencies.name: gsl
dependencies.description:
The GNU Scientific Library (GSL) is a numerical library for C and C++
programmers. It is free software under the GNU General Public License.
The library provides a wide range of mathematical routines such as
random number generators, special functions and least-squares fitting.
There are over 1000 functions in total with an extensive test suite.

dependencies.name: perl
dependencies.description:
Perl 5 is a highly capable, feature-rich programming language with over
27 years of development.

dependencies.name: sparsehash
dependencies.description: Sparse and dense hash-tables for C++ by Google

dependencies.name: zlib-api
dependencies.description:
A free, general-purpose, legally unencumbered lossless data-compression
library.
